Text:
TxJag

How do you speed up seeding settings?

I'm using utorrent to seed my posts and it's very slow - mostly less than 10kb/s. 

sometimes it will increase to over 50, but I do not understand why. How do I make it consistently seed at over 100 kb/s? I have no problem downloading at rates of over 400/kb/s. 

do you know what to do?

Well I seed at 75 kb/s. which as fast as it'll ever go, occasionally it may touch 80+ but only for a blink. It's really all about who is seeding after us. I will always double post my uploads hence the demonoid file included.

it's also limited to what your ISP will allow to come in and out bandwidth wise. My speed says 54 mbps but on a popular file that's been seeded well then ill only download MAX 600 kbps and depending on size will have it rather quickly though.
